Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; exterior: glazed black (almost completely worn); underside: trace of white slip; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: The number 704 is written in pencil on the exterior of the foot. For parallels regarding squat patterned chalices, see Lemos no. 1062 from Kamiros.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1105) (phase 2)
